attributes.action: Cancel current year 10s (class of 2024) GCSE for next year.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to help us enforce this as the year 10s really need a break and it’s very unfair on them.
attributes.background: The current year 10s, also known as class of 2024 have missed out on over 6 months of education last year, and this year they are missing more due to COVID 19, yes they’re on remote learning but some students find it very difficult to focus online.
